Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Enacts the "consumer and small business protection act"
Summary: Enacts the "Consumer and Small business Protection Act"; relates to standing for persons affected by prohibited or unlawful business practices; expands prohibited acts to include unfair, deceptive or abusive acts.
LawCode: Amd ยง349, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "Consumer and Small business Protection Act"
